title: Twilight Basics
description: Test your knowledge of the Twilight saga!

questions.question: What town does Bella move to at the start of Twilight?
questions.explanation: Bella Swan moves to the rainy town of Forks, Washington to live with her father Charlie.

questions.question: Who is the author of the Twilight series?
questions.explanation: Stephenie Meyer wrote the Twilight series, which became a global phenomenon.

questions.question: There are four books in the main Twilight series.
questions.explanation: The main series consists of Twilight, New Moon, Eclipse, and Breaking Dawn.

questions.question: What is the name of Bella's father?
questions.explanation: Charlie Swan is Bella's father and the police chief of Forks.

questions.question: What makes the Cullen vampires different from others?

options.text: They can walk in sunlight normally

questions.explanation: The Cullens are 'vegetarian' vampires who choose to drink only animal blood instead of human blood.

questions.question: Twilight vampires burn in the sunlight.
questions.explanation: In Twilight, vampires don't burn in sunlight - instead, their skin sparkles like diamonds.

questions.question: What class do Bella and Edward first share?
questions.explanation: Bella and Edward first meet as lab partners in Biology class at Forks High School.

questions.question: What is the name of the Native American reservation near Forks?
questions.explanation: La Push is the Quileute reservation where Jacob Black and his family live.
